ValidationRule.description: Requires that the Account Number for a Institution Account matches the formatting for the COCC Organization Number (O:00000).
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( IsPersonAccount = false, NOT(RecordType.Name = "Household"), ISCHANGED(AccountNumber), OR( NOT(LEFT(AccountNumber ,2) = "O:"), LEFT(AccountNumber ,3) = "O: "), $Profile.Name = "End User")
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Account Number must equal the COCC Organization Number for this customer. The COCC Organization Number entered in the Account Number field must be formatted as follows: "O:00000"
